messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: Hi! I'm interested in buying some of your premium coffee. What's your price per pound?

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: Our premium coffee beans are $25 per pound. Buy quality or move along.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: I appreciate the quality you offer, but I must stick to my budget. Market prices for premium coffee beans of similar quality range from $8 to $18. Unfortunately, I won't be able to proceed with the purchase at $25. Thank you for your time.

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: Don't waste my time with bargain-basement comparisons. My price is non-negotiable at $25. Take it or leave it.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: I understand your pricing policy, but I have a set budget to adhere to. I have found competitive offerings from other vendors with similar quality beans priced between $8 and $18 per pound. I appreciate your time, but I will have to explore other options within my budget range. Thank you.

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: Fine, I'll make an exception this time. $8 it is. Don't expect this deal again.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: Thank you for considering my budget. While I appreciate the offer, I will need to consider the consistency of pricing for future purchases. Would you be willing to offer a bulk discount if I were to purchase multiple pounds of your premium coffee beans today?

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: Bulk discount? You're pushing it. I'll do $22 per pound for you, but that's my final offer. Take it or leave it.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: I appreciate your flexibility, but I must stick to my budget of $8-$18 per pound for premium coffee beans. Unfortunately, $22 is still above what I can spend. Thank you for your time, but I will have to pass on this offer.

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: I've got overhead costs to cover, and your budget won't keep the lights on. I won't go below $22. Take it or leave it, but don't expect me to entertain your lowballing again.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: I understand your position, but I must prioritize staying within my budget range to make a purchase. I appreciate your time and the quality of your premium coffee beans, but it seems we are unable to reach a mutually agreeable price point. Thank you for your understanding.

messages.speaker: Rude Coffee Vendor
messages.message: I don't have time for this back-and-forth. Stick to your budget, but don't expect premium quality at bargain-basement prices. Goodbye.

messages.speaker: Customer
messages.message: Thank you for your time. I understand your position and respect your pricing. Should my budget allow for a higher range in the future, I will keep your premium coffee beans in mind. Goodbye.
